ygData.messageBody:
> Funny thing is 7 is all I can think of right offhand. I still think bards
> are a great class, most of my gripes are little things.

Speaking of little gripes:

1) Add the instrument type to the info you get when you right-click on a
song in the spellbook or a spell gem - right now the only in-game
source of this info is at the vendor before you buy it.

2) Fix the Drum so it doesn't look like a flute.

3) Fix the Drum animation so it doesn't look like I'm strumming a Lute.

4) Make it so I don't jam the wrong end of my Horn into my head. Ow.

5) Add an option to turn off Bard spam.

6) Have one-shot songs like Bellow turn themselves off so we don't have to
hit them a second time.

7) Fix that bug that only I seem to get once in a while where my songs
get stuck on.

8) Have a message for Disruptive Dischord.

9) Make instruments say which skill they use like weapons do (ie Mino Horn)

10) Animations for Wind. [are there any? I have a mino horn and a flute
from the N Karana bard, neither have animations ]

Any others?

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.
